metadata.title: CVE-2017-10989 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
The getNodeSize function in ext/rtree/rtree.c in SQLite through 3.19.3, asused in GDAL and other products, mishandles undersized RTree blobs in acrafted database, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read or possiblyunspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10989` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
libsqlite3-0 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
sqlite3 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2').
